body:
This build is for KNL with intel compilers - and using 'cflags' in compilers.yaml.  This was working before - but now is broken due to bb5d83890d4f9a95ab7ef410221aaff0f2f76535 [per git bisect]

I have the following in compilers.yaml
```
- compiler:
    environment:
      set:
        LD_LIBRARY_PATH:: "/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/mpi/intel64/lib:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/mpi/mic/lib:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/ipp/lib/intel64:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/mkl/lib/intel64_lin:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/tbb/lib/intel64/gcc4.7:/homes/intel/18u2/debugger_2017/iga/lib:/homes/intel/18u2/debugger_2017/libipt/intel64/lib:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/daal/lib/intel64_lin:/homes/intel/18u2/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/daal/../tbb/lib/intel64_lin/gcc4.4"
    extra_rpaths: {}
    flags:
      cflags:  "-O3 -fp-model fast -xMIC-AVX512"
      fflags:  "-O3 -fp-model fast -xMIC-AVX512"
      cxxflags: "-O3 -fp-model fast -xMIC-AVX512"
```
etc..

Now - when build a package - I get build errors.


title: regression with processing 'cflags' in compilers.yaml
